item.title: How to make admin
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

Setting player rights via the char file isnâ€™t the only way. In some files (Forgot the names but may post later) will contain:
if(playerName.equals.Ignorecase(â€œmodnamehereâ€){
playerRights =3};
So if you know the mods name, you can search the source for the name and change it to your character name. Hope that helps.

Read full topic
